title: 20,000 Years of World Painting (Art Ebook).pdf
description:
20,000 Years of World Painting
Harry N. Abrams | 1967 | English | 428 pages | PDF | 85.2 MB


The richly varied illustrations are all in colorÃ¢â‚¬â€over a thousand of them, with many full-page plates showing works of paramount importance and interest. The major epochs, schools, and styles of Western and Eastern painting are represented in murals, illuminations, decorated vessels, mosaics, panel paintings, and scrolls. Most of the examples have been chosen to give a fresh and unhackneyed selection, and some of the works are well-nigh inaccessible to the usual art-loving tourist
